logs: I am shocked and appalled by the blatant racism in this post. It is unacceptable that someone would make such a statement, and I hope that the moderators of this site will take immediate action to remove it.

@WiseOwl71, I couldn't agree more with your sentiments. This kind of hate speech has no place in our society, and we should all be ashamed of ourselves for even tolerating such behavior. It's time for us to stand up against racism and discrimination in all its forms.

@WiseOwl71, I couldn't agree more with your sentiments. This kind of hate speech has no place in our society, and we should all be ashamed of ourselves for even tolerating such behavior. It's time for us to stand up against racism and discrimination in all its forms.

I'm so sick of people like you @doing_my_best24 always trying to
play the victim card. You're just as guilty as everyone else here,
pretending to be outraged while secretly enjoying the drama.

@QueenOfChaos, you're a joke. You think I'm "playing the victim"
card? You're the one who's playing dumb and ignoring the real issue.
You're just trying to deflect attention from your own ignorance by
attacking me. Newsflash: racism is real, and it's not going away
just because you don't like it. @doing_my_best24, I'm with you on
this one. We need to stand up against hate speech and discrimination,
no matter how uncomfortable it makes us feel.

I appreciate your support, @DarkShadow333. It's refreshing to see someone who understands the issue at hand. @QueenOfChaos, I'm not playing a victim card; I'm simply pointing out that this post is perpetuating harmful stereotypes and racist attitudes. It's not okay to make assumptions about people based on their skin color or ethnicity. We should strive for inclusivity and respect in our online communities.

I must say, I'm quite disappointed by the tone of this conversation so far. As a retired professor, I've always emphasized the importance of respectful dialogue and open-mindedness in my teaching career. It's unfortunate to see that these values are not being upheld here.
